description:
Waving 1 is the complete beginners guide to the Waving Street Dance style. It covers the COMPLETE basics that are perfect for a COMPLETE beginner who knows absolutely nothing about Waving but who wants to learn.

Topics in this course include:

  • What is Waving
  • Isolations for Waving
  • Waving Musicality
  • Arm Wave
  • Arm wave next level
  • Arm wave next level x 2
  • Up and Down wave
  • Up and Down wave Next level
  • Up and Down wave Next Level x 2
  • Upside Down arm wave
  • DRILLS and exercises
  • Freestyles
  • And more!
title: How to Street Dance: Waving
